## metrics package

A component that reports metrics of Node.js, the LoopBack framework, and your application to Prometheus.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [MetricsComponent](./metrics.metricscomponent.md) | A component providing metrics for Prometheus |
